Pre-Game Insights: Both teams have pledged an enterprising brand of cricket for the match.
The teams have a history of rivalry, with recent clashes including a Super Over win for USA in 2021.
Canada has returned to the same ODI tier since their previous meeting in 2019.
The USA team has been preparing by playing seven T20Is in April and May, after a 21-month gap.
Canada's new coach, Stuart Law, has brought in players like Shadley van Schalkwyk, Harmeet Singh, Andries Gous, and Corey Anderson.
The USA team is excited to be at the T20 World Cup and believes the new additions have improved the squad.
Canada is focused on expressing themselves and playing to their potential.
The Grand Prairie Stadium is considered one of the best fields in the world for T20 cricket.
